title: issues with the support page?
body: so i was trying to click on the riot support page login and it isnt working

replies.body: First I'd try to [**clear your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) to see if that lets you in. If that doesn't help at all, let's try logging in with a different browser if possible. Hit me back and let me know if that works!

Yeah i just tried both and i tried to use internet explorer and it didnt work as well nothings going through idk why it just ses This page isnâ€™t working

login.support.riotgames.com is currently unable to handle this request.
HTTP ERROR 503

I've noticed a few players having this issue, and I was able to replicate it myself here. I'd like for you to reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that we can gather that data, as well as help you out one on one!
Sadly its still wont allow me to go any further

{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} 

Well that just happened.....I admit it's a wee bit late and I did not think that post through. Obviously you cannot submit a ticket if you cannot log it. I apologize again for that post lol.

Moving along, we're working to see if we can get this figured out at this moment. I was able to finally get through myself by manually changing my DNS settings. Check out our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5), specifically the DNS steps and let me know if that helps!

Again, please ignore that rather dumb slip-up XD. Hey, at least I admit when I was dumb?
nooo your not dumb things like that happen to everyone  but sadly that didnt help either   world is so cruel

Thanks for that! 

One last thing, when you changed your DNS you may need to restart your pc for those changes to take effect. Make sure those DNS settings stayed set to 8.8.8.8 and 8.8.4.4, let your pc restart, then try to access the support page in Internet Explorer. Let me know if that still hasn't worked, and if not I can see what I can do on my end to get you a ticket made!

yep it stayed the same and forsure i mean its nothing really big i just want to find out whats been going on with my FPS in league lately it could just be my computer being bad but i have attempted to do everything that would try and fix it yet like if i go to play normal summoners rift at some point in the game my fps will just die out  normally lategame and when near the enemy base for some reason  i cant even look at my fps ingame because they are not showing up in the corner

Hmmmm the plot thickens. 

I just reached out to a few more of our tech guys (since we can't get you a ticket to them directly -grumble-). They've suggested that we try using a VPN like [**CyberGhost**](http://www.cyberghostvpn.com/en_us) as a last resort to see if we can get you on that support site. I know this is frustrating, but a least we can slowly narrow this down.

Also since you mentioned you needed a ticket due to FPS issues, luckily I can help with that as well ^_^! Since your FPS slowly starts getting worse throughout the game, there might be an issue with your pc having a hard time rendering everything that's going on in the match. Check out this [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) and you should be able to smooth those frames out.
